entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
